channel.title: Comments on: My Little Pony: When “Friendship” Is Toxic
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: That interesting, I've not thought of this before but you're right. These kids stories must at least be partially responsible for giving kids the wrong ideas abut friendships that last into adulthood
item.content:encoded: That interesting, I’ve not thought of this before but you’re right. These kids stories must at least be partially responsible for giving kids the wrong ideas abut friendships that last into adulthood
